name: Graphics Card
description: The purpose of a graphics cards is to render graphics. Without a graphics card, your computer can not display any information, let alone function how you need it.

name: Processor
description: The processor, also known as the CPU, provides the instructions and processing power the computer needs to do its work.

name: RAM
description: Random Access Memory (RAM) is a general-purpose memory that usually stores the user data in a program. RAM is volatile in the sense that it cannot retain data in the absence of power, i.e. data are lost after the removal of power.
